Posts.Content: Oct 12, 2011 08:00AM Sen wrote: I got a second opinion from  https://econsults.partners.org which can be done online and the opinion will be made by specialists from Harvard, Dana Farber Insititute, MGH and others. Your physician will have to submit all your documents and you and he/she will get the answer whithin 5 days. The costs vary depending on what material has to be reviewed. But it still might be cheaper than traveling yourself.
